casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Larry Davis (11907)

Dupont, C. J., and Lavery and Heiman, Js.

Argued October 24 decision released November 15, 1994 John T. Walkley, special public defender, for the appellant (defendant). Leah Hawley, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Michael Dearington, state’s attorney, and Robert J. O'Brien, supervisory assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
